name: Mad Hacker
description:
Noise… static… and eerie pulses of disruption all over. If there are these unbearable sounds, what do you do? Break the source, of course! In this case you’ll need to hack them. Literally, with your beloved smart axe. The process is called HAXE. Somehow those eerily glowing towers look a lot like your own brain implants. But who’d care anyway? Not you. You can’t remember what’s up with the world. Just that you’re sure as heck gonna feel a lot better if those structures go tumbling down like dominoes!

3AM's entry for the Weekly Game Jam 170  themed Chain Reaction. Hack your way through concrete and metal in this sterile cityscape.

Controls:

Move with: W,A,S,D 
Lock-on a tower with: E
Aim with: Mouse Movements
HAXE with: Hold SPACEBAR
